titles.title: Second Sunday of Lent Year C Psalms

properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: The Lord is my light and my salvation.

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines:
O Lord, hear my voice when I call;
have mercy and answer me.
Of you my heart has spoken,
“Seek his face.”

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines:
I believe I shall see the Lord's
goodness in the land of the living.
Wait for the Lord; be strong;
be stouthearted, and wait for the Lord!
